name: Marvnext
description: Marvnext is a Pune based company.
overview:
OffersOnClick.com is a product of Marvnext , an emerging enterprise in the field of web development based in Pune.

We endeavor to bring you exclusive offers on your favorite shopping categories such as mobiles, computers, electronics,home appliances, apparels & accessories etc. It is often seen that people generally browse through newspapers & magazines,call up their friends, and sometimes surf the TV channels to get information about any offer that may be available at the time of buying a product in their locality. And guess what!!! Nobody enjoys this way of hunting for offers which is really cumbersome, disorganized and time consuming.
